invite-popup.title: Organisation invitation
invite-popup.description: You have been invited to an organisation

invite-popup.title: Team invitation

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.empty: There are no Passkeys linked to your account. Create one by pressing the button above!

edit.title: Edit Passkey
edit.description: Change the name of your passkey

delete.title: Delete Passkey
delete.description:
Deleting this passkey will permanently disallow access to {brand_name} via this Passkey.



To confirm the deletion, please repeat the Passkey's name

api_access.title: API Access

toast.copied: Copied the token to your clipboard

errors.no_access: You do not have access to generate an API Key.

api_access.warning:
API Keys give access to administrate organisations and events according to the permissions of the user who generated it. They expire 30 days after generation.



It is currently NOT POSSIBLE to rotate a key after it is generate, as it is stateless. To prevent unwanted usage after potential theft, the owner's account currently needs to be removed

change-logo.title: Change logo
change-logo.description: Upload a logo which will be shown publicly throughout {brand_name}

change-banner.title: Change banner
change-banner.description: Upload a banner which will be shown publicly throughout {brand_name}

remove-dialog.title: Remove {name}
remove-dialog.description: Are you sure that you want to remove this manager?

logo.title: Organisation logo
logo.description: This is the public logo of your organisation, shown all throughout {brand_name}.

name.title: Organisation name
name.description: This is the public name of your organisation, shown all throughout {brand_name}.

description.title: Description

description.placeholder: Give your organisation a nice description to give others a look and feel of how you roll.

danger-zone.title: Danger zone
danger-zone.description: Deleting this organisation will permanently remove all details about this organisation, all events, and other related data. This action cannot be reversed!

dialog.title: Delete {org}
dialog.description:
Deleting this organisation will permanently remove all details about this organisation, all events, and other related data. This action cannot be reversed!



To confirm the deletion, please repeat the organisation's name and email address

confirmed.title: You're in! 🎉
confirmed.description: Your registration is confirmed by the organiser. Make sure to save the details down below

awaiting.title: Awaiting confirmation
awaiting.description: We are waiting for the organiser to confirm your registration. In the meantime, save the details down below

team-guide.title: Three steps to register for this event

step1.title: Choose or create a team
step1.description: ⁠Create a team or register your existing team. If you don't have a team yet, create a team first. Choose a team name and send {min_others, plural, =0 {} other {at least #}} { uncomputed, select, false {and} other {}} {max_others, plural, =-1 {} other {at most #}} {uncomputed, select, false {other} other {}} teammates an invite (NOTE: These teammates may not be younger or older than the event for which you are registering.) Only when they have accepted your invite can you proceed to step 2. If you have already created your team and your teammates have already accepted your invite, you can continue immediately to step 2.

step2.title: Choose your players
step2.description-team-max: ⁠Select the players for this stop. From the maximum {team_max} players that your team can has, choose {min, plural, =0 {} other {at least #}} {both, select, true {and} other {}} {max, plural, =-1 {} other {at most #}} players for this stop.
step2.description-no-team-max: ⁠Select the players for this stop. Of the players in your team, choose {min, plural, =0 {} other {at least #}} {both, select , true {and} other {}} {max, plural, =-1 {} other {at most #}} players for this stop.

step3.title: Confirm your participation in this stop.
step3.description: Check that all information is correct and confirm your participation. If you also want to register for other stops, you must do so separately.

not-eligable.description: You, or any of your teams, are not eligable to sign up to this event. This may be because you or your team members may not meet the age requirements, or the amount of people that need to sign up to this event. Kindly note that players who have not yet accepted a team invite, do not count towards the number of people inside your team.
not-eligable.new-team: If you wish to create a new team to signup to this event, you can do so too.

explanation.why-team: Why is this team not eligable?
explanation.why-user: Why is my account not eligable?

table-eligable.caption: If your account or your team does not show up here, this means that they are not eligable to sign up for this event, possibly due to age or pool size constraints set by the organiser. Kindly note that players who have not yet accepted an invite to a team do not count up to the total team size.

step3.title: 3. Confirm registration
step3.description: Confirm that the details for your registration are all correct to confirm your registration

eligability-report.pending-invites: There {invites, plural, =1 {is} other {are}} still {invites} more pending {invites, plural, =1 {invite} other {invites}}.
eligability-report.eligable-and-players-lacking: You need {num_missing} more {num_missing, plural, =1 {player} other {players}} in your team.
eligability-report.eligable-lacking: Only {num_eligable} out of {num_players} {num_players, plural, =1 {player} other {players}} in your team {num_eligable, plural, =1 {is} other {are}} eligable. You need {num_missing} more {num_missing, plural, =1 {player} other {players}}.
eligability-report.players-lacking: You need {num_lacking} more {num_missing, plural, =1 {player} other {players}} in your team.
eligability-report.min-pool-personal: You need at least {min_pool_size} players to register for this event, which means you need to register with a team.
eligability-report.min-team-personal: You need at least {min_team_size} players in a team to register for this event, which means you need to register with a team.
eligability-report.player-overflow: There {num_overflow, plural, =1 {is} other {are}} ${num_overflow} too many {num_overflow, plural, =1 {player} other {players}} in your team.
eligability-report.num-under-age: There {num_under_age, plural, =1 {is} other {are}} {num_under_age} {num_under_age, plural, =1 {player} other {players}} in your team that are not eligable to play, because they are too young.
eligability-report.num-over-age: There {num_over_age, plural, =1 {is} other {are}} {num_over_age} {num_over_age, plural, =1 {player} other {players}} in your team that are not eligable to play, because they are too old.

dialog.submit: I no longer want to participate
